name: A rotten squid-like tentacle
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users constitution impressively.
It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration slightly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
A death in the realm causes changes in its effects.
